mortgageCalculatorDescription: Soum, the leading digital intermediary in KSA, connects you with financing entities to simplify and expedite the approval of your application
enterDetails: Enter your details to calculate car financing
enterRealStateDetails:
Enter the following information to calculate your
dream Home financing
financingTermTooltip: The available loan terms range from 6 to 60 months
monthlyIncomeTooltip: It is the amount you receive each month
netMonthlyIncomeTooltip: It is the remaining amount of income after deducting all costs, expenses, and taxes
carPriceTooltip: The car's price as offered by the seller
downPaymentTooltip: The down payment amount must be at least 10% of the property's price
financingAmountTooltip: The principal amount you will receive from the lender (Loan Amount = Car Price - Down Payment)
salaryDeductionPercentageTooltip: The percentage that will be deducted from your monthly salary
monthlyInstallmentTooltip: These are fixed payments made each month to repay the financing amount
finalPaymentTooltip: The remaining payment, which is 30% of the financing amount
note: Please note, the financing calculator provides an estimate with about 85% accuracy. Actual rates may vary by lender.
subNoteCar: Apply now to get your car as quickly as possible
subNoteRE: Apply now to get your dream home as quickly as possible
LESS_SALARY_ERROR: The salary must be a minimum of 3,000 Riyal
NET_SALARY_GREATER: Net Monthly Salary must be lower than monthly salary
DEDUCTION_EXCEEDED_ERROR: You have exceeded the allowed deduction rate of 45%
propertyPriceTooltip: The property's price as offered by the seller
financeAmountTooltipRealState:
The principal amount you will receive from 
 the lender (Loan Amount = Property Price - 
 Down Payment)
DOWN_PAYMENT_LESS_THAN_10_ERROR:
The down payment amount must be at least 10%
of the property's price
financeTermTooltipRealState: The available financing terms range from 2 to 25 years.
financingTermNoResults: No results found. Available loan terms range from {start} to {end} months. Please try again.
financingTermNoResultsRE: No results found. Available loan terms range from {start} to {end} years. Please try again.
applyForCarFinancing: Go to our app to apply for car financing
applyForRealEstateFinancing: Go to our app to apply for real estate financing
REQUIRED_NET_MONTHLY_INCOME_FIELD: Please enter your net monthly income
